entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
